titleStmt.title: The manner of the impeachment of the XII bishops accused of high treason for prefering a petition, and making a protestation to the subverting the fundamentall laws and being of Parliaments whereunto is added the said petition and remonstrance of the said bishops.
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1582-1650.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
